Name.item: Kwethluk peatland, near Three Step Mountain, Yukon-Kushokwim Delta

SampleLocationDescription.item: Study peatland site is in a drained thermokarst basin, in an area of sporadic permafrost and moderate ground ice. Vegetation includes Ericaceous shrubs like Labrador tea (Rhododendron tomentosum), dwarf birch (Betula nana), small cranberry (Vaccinium oxycoccos), sedges such as water sedge (Carex aquatilis) and tussock cottongrass (Eriophorum vaginatum), and mosses (Sphagnum spp., Tomenthypnum nitens).
